patterns: Can I exchange for a different size?
responses: If the size doesn't fit, you can initiate a size exchange. Contact our customer support for assistance in the exchange process.

For size-related issues, contact our customer support to explore options for exchanging your item for the correct size.

patterns: How do I unsubscribe from newsletters?
responses: To unsubscribe from newsletters, click on the 'Unsubscribe' link at the bottom of any email you receive from us.
Manage your email preferences easily by clicking on the 'Unsubscribe' link in our newsletters.
If you wish to stop receiving emails, use the 'Unsubscribe' link at the bottom of our newsletters. We respect your preferences.
